alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:48AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nye County through 1015 AM PDT... At 948 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Round Mountain, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Round Mountain and Mount Jefferson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
